column4: Hey there, I need some help with my installation, I'm a newbie to linux and my installation is freezing during network configuration (dhcp), can anyone help me out?
is ur net attached? router up?
ur wireless modem attached to Ubuntu as well? did the install recognize it?
u mean the install isnt even done? oopsie
can u get past it? it wants to get to ubuntu and update itself ... u can probably get the net configured without that (maybe)
how is wireless modem attached, usb?
my cable router (linksys) was recognized out the chute ... enet attached

if ur router is similar to most u can get to it thru a browser; a fixed ip address gets ur to a config page; do u have a (gulp) windows machine or another linux box u can check to see if the port is active ??  i have linksys and not sure about alcatel
ask _jason  he might be able to help (if he's on)
I think he's not around, anyone else you can send me to?
that help? there seems to be some relevant stuff
